text:
Row, row, row your boat
Gently down the stream,

Merrily merrily, merrily, merrily
Life is but a dream

Row, row, row your boat
Gently down the stream,
If you see a crocodile, don't forget to scream!

Row, row, row your boat
Gently down the stream,

Merrily merrily, merrily, merrily
Life is but a dream

Row, row, row your boat
Gently to the shore ,
If you see a Lion there listen to it roar!

Row, row, row your boat
Gently down the stream,

Merrily merrily, merrily, merrily
Life is but a dream

Row, row, row your boat
Gently down the stream,
If you see a crocodile, don't forget to scream!

Row, row, row your boat
Gently down the stream,

Merrily merrily, merrily, merrily
Life is but a dream

Row, row, row your boat
Gently to the shore ,
If you see a Lion there listen to it roar!
